author: ebswift
msg: Initial import of the new WiX build for win32.
Added WiX MSI project for new unified installer.  This installer allows the user to select Apache bindings from the one installer.  The project is built using SharpDevelop 3.

This is the initial import.  Further descriptions are to be provided for expected paths, required tools, as well as porting the old method of building documentation into this new installation builder.

author: kfogel
msg: (svn_path_canonicalize): Take an early out if path is "", to avoid
accessing uninitialized memory later when we look at *(dst - 1).
(Discussed with him in IRC and dev@ posts right before this commit.)
